projects.title: Vertex Block Descent
projects.desc: My work in progress implementation of a couple scenes using logic from Chen's Vertex Block Descent paper.

projects.title: Particle Systems
projects.desc: C++ physics simulation & OpenGL rendering of portal-like particles with multiple features. About 40 hours were invested to this project.

projects.title: cudasimulateworlds
projects.desc: GPU-parallelized simulation of k independent worlds with particle-particle collision checks. The goal is to maintain equal performance per world; weak scaling as world count increases.

projects.title: cudapointcollisions
projects.desc: Maximizing particle count in GPU-parallelized (NVIDIA RTX 4090) physics simulation with 6 plane checks and basic forces while minimizing kernel time.

projects.title: 1 Point 6 Planes
projects.desc: Introduction to physics simulation with C++ / OpenGL - bouncing ball against 6 planes.

projects.title: Ray Tracer
projects.desc: C++ ray tracing engine (from scratch) featuring constructive solid geometry, anti-aliasing, multithreading, and 9 scenes.

projects.title: Free-Look World
projects.desc: C++ / OpenGL free-look world with movement, zoomable camera, HUD, minimap, textures, animated objects, and lighting.

projects.title: Breast Cancer & Pneumonia Classification with Machine Learning
projects.desc: Python / PyTorch AUC maximization by deep learning for imbalanced medical classification tasks.

projects.title: Rasterizer
projects.desc: C++ rasterizer from coordinate data to image. Showcases BCC interpolation, z-buffers, lighting, and mesh transforms.

projects.title: OpenGL Object Shaders
projects.desc: C++ OpenGL shaders featuring Blinn-Phong (3+ materials), silhouette, and cel shading with variable time and lighting.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.desc: This website - built on native HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.title: pypocketwatch
projects.desc: Daily updating script to scrape, filter, and report online noise relating to the sale of the Seiko SARY085, my favorite watch.

projects.title: TBD...
projects.desc: Many more projects have yet to be migrated to this site.
